{Xiane}

    Xiane grunted as his sheild took the brunt of the missle and a few of
the lasers, a few of the blasts managed to make it around the energy barrier
to slice across his metalic head, still it took a lot of strength to not be
thrown back by the sheer viciousness of the attack.

    Shifting forward slowly his eyes locking on the pair darkly, sword
unwaivering before him as he slowly advanced, the energy sheild flickering,
his internal sensors warning him its power to absorb the blasts had nearly
depleted all its power...
